teachersV2.core
Class Core

java.lang.Object
  teachersV2.core.Core

public class Core
extends java.lang.Object

Contains all the manipulation of the program with the menu, reading and writing files.

Copyright 2012 - This file is part of the Java Project : Teachers.

Teachers is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the zlib license.
See the COPYING file.

Author:
Jeremy LOR (jlor@etudiant.univ-mlv.fr), Thomas LEROUX (tleroux@etudiant.univ-mlv.fr)

displayStudent

public static void displayStudent(int mode)
This display of students is for choices.

Parameters:
mode - if 0, we display all the informations of the student, 1 only his name and his average.

addProfessors

public static Professor addProfessors(Professor prof)
Adds the professors in the profList.

Parameters:
prof - The Professor.
Returns:
prof if the professor is added for the first time in the profList, FileReaderService.profList.get(pos) otherwise to return the existent Professor.

addPromotion

public static Promotion addPromotion(Promotion p)
Add the Promotion in pList.

Parameters:
p - The Promotion.
Returns:
p if the promotion is added for the first time in the pList, FileReaderService.pList.get(pos) otherwise to return the existent Promotion.
